lexUnit.name: raise.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: increase the amount, level, or strength of

sentence.text: Earnings per share moved up from 14.04p to 15.36p and the company is raising the final dividend from 4.34p to 4.57p , to boost the total by 5.3 per cent to 6.36p .
